import React from "react"; import { useAuth } from "../context/AuthContext"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const Dashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleSignOut = () => { localStorage.removeItem("token"); localStorage.removeItem("orgType"); navigate("/"); window.location.reload(); }; return (
{/* 导航栏 */}
Cause-connect
{user?.orgName}
{/* 主要内容区域 */}

Welcome, {user?.orgName}!

{/* 组织信息卡片 */}

Organization Details

Organization Type

{localStorage.getItem("orgType")}

Email

{user?.email}

{/* 功能按钮区域 */}
); }; export default Dashboard;
